location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 41: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], gives instructions for John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire, to forward a letter to the President and Council at Bombay. The letter in question, which is not included here, informs the President and Council that, according to a letter from Consul Abbott, dated 27 June 1780, Captain Scott Smith was expected at Aleppo on 29 June with dispatches from the Honourable Company in London.
